name: Deck the Halls (FeatureKreep)
description:
Oh no, it's almost Christmas! And your backyard hasn't been decorated yet! What will your neighbors think of you?!

Control an extension cord to decorate your property with X-mas lights. Remember: you've got to cover each square inch before you plug the cord in.

Made for StraightUp Game Jam (theme: "Down to the wire")

Controls

WASD/arrow keys — movement

R — restart

Q — toggle snow on/off

Credits

Art & coding: @FeatureKreep

Music: chefelf (8-bit remix)

Want to support me? You can donate to my Ko-fi ☕
